Uses of Interface
com.stormpath.sdk.cache.CacheManagerBuilder

Packages that use CacheManagerBuilder
com.stormpath.sdk.cache   
 

Uses of CacheManagerBuilder in com.stormpath.sdk.cache
 

Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.cache that return CacheManagerBuilder
static CacheManagerBuilder Caches.newCacheManager()
          Instantiates a new CacheManagerBuilder suitable for SINGLE-JVM APPLICATIONS.
 CacheManagerBuilder CacheManagerBuilder.withCache(CacheConfigurationBuilder builder)
          Adds configuration settings for a specific Cache region managed by the built CacheManager, like the region's Time to Live and Time to Idle.
 CacheManagerBuilder CacheManagerBuilder.withDefaultTimeToIdle(long tti, TimeUnit timeUnit)
          Sets the default Time to Idle (TTI) for all cache regions managed by the built CacheManager.
 CacheManagerBuilder CacheManagerBuilder.withDefaultTimeToLive(long ttl, TimeUnit timeUnit)
          Sets the default Time to Live (TTL) for all cache regions managed by the built CacheManager.
